svg.text: üìä Main Results: Language Modeling Perplexity (Lower is Better)
üèÜ BD3-LM achieves NEW STATE-OF-THE-ART among diffusion models! With L'=1 tuned schedule, matches AR exactly!
‚Ä¢ Larger L' ‚Üí More parallelism, faster generation
‚Ä¢ Can generate beyond training context length
‚Ä¢ First diffusion model to support this!
‚Ä¢ KV caching works like in AR models
‚Ä¢ 10x fewer steps than Gaussian diffusion baselines
Optimal Clipped Schedules by Block Size
Different block sizes need different optimal schedules!
Block Diffusion: The Best of Both Worlds
Autoregressive Quality + Diffusion Parallelism + Variable Length + KV Caching
